attributes.action: not allow speaker Martin to be given a Peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop michael martin ( The retiring Speaker of the house of commons) from being offered a peerage. It would be pretty sick of the government and members of parliament to give this signal award when he has failed in his duty to protect the British democratic system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
